Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-26595 affecting package xorg-x11-server-Xwayland for versions less than 24.1.6-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-26595 affecting package xorg-x11-server-Xwayland for versions less than 24.1.6-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package xorg-x11-server-Xwayland is earlier than 24.1.6-1, affected by CVE-2025-26595
